page.title: 14EVENTS
page.content: Each year we have a week of activities leading up to the Fete. Fete week 1985 started on Saturday, 15th. June, with a disco and at 8 o'clock Sarah Couchman won the Miss Kilndown Competition. On Sunday we had an obstacle race, also a Church Festival Service. On Monday we had a Darts and Pool competition and on Tuesday a Flower Show. On Wednesday there was Bingo at the pub, followed by Morris Dancing. On Thursday there were Keep Fit Displays. The Friday Treasure Hunt was postponed until Sunday because of rain. On Fete Day there was a procession from the Globe and Rainbow with Miss Kilndown leading floats and a Jazz Band and old fashioned cars. There were lots of games and stalls. The 1,114 pounds raised went to sixteen different village organisations and funds.
